name: Casa Cuevas - Reserva Maduro - Robusto
additionalNotes: After being on hiatus for ten years, the Casa Cuevas Reserva Maduro is back. The Reserva Maduro wears a dark Mexican San Andres Maduro wrapper that is expertly wrapped over a Dominican Piloto Cubano binder, which contains Dominican and Nicaraguan Omepete fillers to create a pleasing sweet and spicy flavor profile. It is a full-flavor, full-strength cigar that is considered to be Luis Cuevas Sr.’ favorite blend as well as the company’s signature line. The Casa Cuevas Reserva Maduro is handmade in the Dominican Republic.
